column4: synaptic only shows ndiswrapper 1.38, how do i update to 1.47
downloaded the tar.gz configd, made, and installed but ndiswrapper -v still shows 1.38
go to google and type ndiswrapper the first option there you will find the 1.47
you have to remove the old version first
1: sudo rmmod ndiswrapper 2: sudo apt-get remove ndiswrapper-utils
Now you need to hunt down and find all instances of ndiswrapper left on your file system.
To become root and look for these files you need.
Delete all instances of ndiswrapper. Then run the two previous commands over again.
after that you can install the new version
If you have any questions go to this page is a step by step on how to remove it and install it http://ubuntu1501.blogspot.com/2007/01/fixing-wifi-on-dell-1501.html
Thats what i use to setup mine and is working fine
in the tut it sez somthing about geting dell windows driver... not on dell, does it matter?
when you get the drivers just rename it with what ever the name you want with this at the end .zip
got 1.47 working, but still cant get usb device to work
